channel.title: Pcwizz's blog
channel.description: Nerd by the name of Pcwizz writes about DevOps, politics, and Free Software.

item.title: Talk: Automation made simple with Rust
item.description: I put together a short prevention on where I see Rust offering some nice patterns for developing service automations; database automation with Rust. Here are the slides: 2019-09-24-rust-and-tell-slides.pdf.
